function.name: AcceptInput
function.description:
Called when a map I/O event occurs.
See also Entity:Fire and Entity:Input for functions to fire Inputs on entities.

arguments.name: input
arguments.description: The input name. Is not guaranteed to be a valid input on the entity.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Data provided with the input. Will be either a string, a number, a boolean or a nil.

returns.description: Return true to prevent this input from being processed. Do not return otherwise.
